rukus.text: Xinshi buzhi yu shahai xinshi, chufei shi wusha. Shui wusha yige xinshi, shui dang shifang yige xindao de nuli, bing yi xue huan jiaofu shi qin, chufei tamen ziyuan rang yu. Bei sha de xinshi, ruguo ta de zongzu shi nimen de diren, namo, xiongshou yingdang shifang yige xindao de nuli. Ruguo bei sha zhe de zongzu shi nimen de mengyou, namo, xiongshou yingdang yi xue huan jiaofu shi qin, bing shifang yige xindao de nuli. Shui buneng shifang nuli, shui dang lianxu zhaijie liang yue, zhe shi yin wei zhenzhu zhunxu ta huiguo zi xin. Zhenzhu shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de.
Shui guyi shahai yige xinshi, shui yao shou huo yu de baochou, er yong ju qizhong, qie shou zhenzhu de qian nu he qi jue, zhenzhu yi wei ta yubei zhongda de xingfa.

Xindao de renmen a! Dang nimen wei zhu dao er chuzheng de shihou, nimen dang shi shi shenshen, nimen buyao dui xiang nimen biaoshi heping de ren shuo:`Ni bushi xinshi.'Nimen yu tu jinshi shenghuo de fuli, dan zai zhenzhu nali you fengfu de fu li. Yiqian, nimen shi xiang nayang de. Dan zhenzhu shi en yu nimen, gu nimen yingdang shi shi shenshen. Zhenzhu que shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de.

Meiyou canji er anzuo jiazhong de xinshi, yu ping ziji de caichan he shengming wei zhu dao er fendou de xinshi, bici shi bu xiangdeng de. Ping ziji de caichan he shengming er fendou de ren, zhenzhu shi tamen chaoguo anzuo jiazhong de ren yiji. Zhenzhu yingxu zhe liang deng ren yao shou zui youhou de baochou. Chu anzuo zhe suo shou de baochou wai, zhenzhu jia ci fendou de ren yizhong zhongda de baochou——
cong zhenzhu fachu de xuduo pin ji, she you, he ci'en. Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.
